author: pieterdavid
body:
After having migrated all uses of these classes to TrackerTopology (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/19398 for the full list of PRs), they can be removed now.

CC @OlivierBondu @alesaggio @vidalm
title: Remove the TIBDetId, TOBDetId, TIDDetId and TECDetId classes
